name: Checks Please
description:
Our submission for the ScoreSpace Jam 21. Theme: Bounce

Checks Please is a game where the goal is to bounce checks as quickly as you can. A check will bounce if its value is larger than the amount of money in your bank account in the top right. If a check will bounce, you send it to your outbox. If a check will not bounce, or its value is lower than your bank account, you must throw it in the trash. More detailed instructions can be found in the game's How to Play section.

Controls:

Left Arrow Key - Throw un-bounceable check in the trash

Right Arrow Key - Send bounceable check to the outbox

Assets Used:

LootLocker SDK for leaderboards

GUI PRO Kit - Casual Game by IneptStudio for our leaderboard sprites

Orloj Font by Jonathan Paterson

Mungil Font by gheraile

Everything else was created by the team.

Team:
